data.name: plAddedFiles.Help

data.name: cmdUpload.Text
data.value: Upload Pending Files

data.name: No_Uploads_Pending.Text
data.value: None

data.name: GalleryUploadsCollectionCache_Cleared.Text
data.value: Previously selection of files to upload has been discarded due to navigation away from this page or time-out. Please make your selections again.

data.name: Total_Size.Text
data.value: Total Size of Pending Uploads (kb)

data.name: Would_Exceed_Quota.Text
data.value: Addition of this file would exceed the gallery quota by {0:F} kb. Please select a smaller file.

data.name: Instructions.Text
data.value:
Files may be uploaded to the gallery by either adding them one by one to a pending uploads list or first packaging them in a zip folder.

Click on the 'Browse' button, select a file from those available on your computer, fill in the fields for any desired information such as 'Title' or 'Author', then click the 'Add File' button.

Continue adding files to the 'Pending Uploads' list as desired. Click on the red 'X' to the right of a pending upload to remove it from the collection. When you have finished choosing files to be uploaded, click on 'Upload Pending Files' to add the selected files to the gallery.

Note: If you navigate away from this page, you will have to re-select the files to be uploaded.

data.name: scnInstructions.Text
data.value: Instructions

data.value: Upload Error:

data.name: MaxPendingUploadsSize_Exceeded.Text
data.value: You may not select additional files for upload until those already pending have been processed. Please click 'Upload Pending Files' to commit those pending upload to file storage or 'X' to remove one or more pending uploads.

data.name: Upload_Success_Pending_Approval.Text
data.value: Files were successfully uploaded but will not appear in the album until approved by administrator or album owner.

data.name: No_Available_Space.Text
data.value: The space available to this gallery has been exceeded. No uploads are allowed at this time.
